commit message:
Added preferences.
Removed hostname/password/username from main activity.

Added new queries.
Delete/Edit raspis.
Changed theme to Holo.Dark.
Fixed crash when returning from settings activity to parent (main).

Updated to new raspitools.
Showing average load as percentage, show temperature scale after
temperature, showing unit for memory output.
Fixed missing translation for setting summary.

Check for no password (fixes #8)
Saving disk and process table, so it can be restored after screen
orientation changed.

Implemented reboot function.
Update of raspitools library, added field 'sudo password' to new/edit
rapsi activities.
Fixed: pull-to-refresh refreshing after no wifi detected

version code 5, version name 1.2.1
Added full path for vcgencmd.
Update to raspitools 0.3.0. Todo: Changes in layout

New preference for frequency unit.
Moved formatting to new Helper class.
Reboot refactored. Sudo password now optional.

Prohibit refreshing via Pull and Action Bar simultaniously.
Fixes #17
Preferences updated (app version, contact developer, rate app).

Edit/Add Pi combined to one XML layout file.
Action bar buttons reworked.
Fixed bug that Pi is present in spinner after it was deleted.
Fixed bug that sudo pw column is not created when updating from version
6 to version > 7.
Wlan query is implemented (fixes #16).

version code 8, versionName 1.3.0
Updated raspitools to 0.3.1.
New dialog for shutdown options (reboot/halt).

Storing log messages on users sdcard (slf4j + logback). New permission
needed.

Revert 'Mavenised project.'

This reverts commit a4b0795f05372bfe59553aefbec6a727d9da133b.

reworked logging again.
Added changelog (code.google.com/p/android-change-log).
Added error messages dialog.

Modified changelog, translated strings.
Added icon to reboot dialog.
Added log, changelog to preferences.
Added icons to preferences.

Refactored logging. Default logging-level is now INFO for app. Added
preference to settings to enable debug logging (level -> DEBUG).

fixed fileNamePattern for RollingFileAppender in logback.xml.
Formatting negative wifi signal quality numbers as dBm, not as
percentage.

version 11.
Fixed logback config, updated changelog.

Query data is saved during app runtime.
Back from Settings no longer launches MainActivity new.
try-catch for parsing of int, long, double etc.

Started reworking new/edit raspi for private/public key auth.
Added FileChooser library.

Changed layout of 'New Raspi'-Acitivity for supporting different auth
methods (ssh password, private key w./without passphrase). TODO: rework
'edit raspi'
Popup dialog when no passphrase for private key is specified.

transparent app icon.
changelog for v 1.4.0

1.4.1
fixed crash when changing orientation and current device has no query
data
fixed bug that current device isnt updated after edit
fixed not working reboot/halt with private key and not saved passphrase
fixed bug with passphrase dialog (cancelable, validation)
fixed some bugs with refresh/pull-to-refresh

Simple fix to reboot and shutdown in OpenElec

The problem is the string that is used to execute the halt or reboot, in OpenELEC only says 'sudo: not found', 'command' in the search string shouldn't be there.

Merge pull request #38 from Mafarricos/patch-1

Simple fix to reboot and shutdown in OpenElec

building with maven.
included android libraries in /libraries.
updated changelog.
Initial setup for Eclipse ADT (no maven, no gradle). Libraries in libs/.
switch back to initial version of logback-android
Fixed bug in reboot/halt mechanism for openELEC.

Merge pull request #45 from eidottermihi/adtbuild

Adtbuild
Removed refresh action, moved restart/shutdown in bar.

Fixed that ps 'commands' with withspace will not be parsed correctly.
Added Guava.
Fixed spinner not updating after new pi is added or pi was deleted.
wip: New activity for custom commands.

add new command implemented, started ListView activity for sending
commands.

Implemented Dialog for command run output.
Closing DBHelper onDestroy.
Autoscroll to bottom of command output.
Showing output is default for now.

Added edit/delete/run context menu to commands.
removed apache commons lang.
German translation for commands.

Merge pull request #48 from eidottermihi/custom-commands

Custom commands

Only show query error messages when app is not in background (same
problem as #40).
Providing more information on query exceptions in the log file (#40).
renaming the existing theme to match the new theme-structure
adding ActionBar-Icons from the latest ActionBar-IconPack, including new xxhdpi images

Merge pull request #50 from larsgrefer/feature/design

Feature/design
Refresh menu item is back, but with 3 hints to pulltorefresh.

Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into feature/actions

new raspicheck logo with full asset according to the iconography guidelines
